system.effect: A fully staffed temple of the Imperial Creed within the vessel, can be deployed from the ship to the surface of a planet to directly tend to the needs of its unwashed masses. Permenant +2 to Morale, and +150 Achievement Points towards Creed Objectives. Once deployed, takes several days to decontruct and bring back to the ship via lifters. One per vessel.
